response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product which I believe will greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a fantastic deal considering its worth and could potentially save you thousands in the long run. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.", "product_price": 12000}
